summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingBobbi Brown Hydrating Face Cream instantly replenishes, conditions, and nourishes skin with its rich yet lightweight formula infused with Algae Extract.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrating formula helps to keep skin moisturized for 24 hours, plus visibly fresh and glowingNon-greasy texture cushions skin for smooth makeup applicationKey IngredientsSignature Enriched Mineral Water BlendSodium HyaluronateTrehaloseFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesMineral OilTriclosanFormaldehydeItem 2583622How To UseMassage onto clean skin morning and night.IngredientsWater\aqua\eau, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric/myristic/stearic Triglyceride, Aleurites Moluccana (kukui) Seed Oil, Myristyl Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate, Algae Extract, Cetyl Phosphate, Polyperfluoromethylisopropyl Ether, Coriandrum Sativum (coriander) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (rosemary), Rosa Canina (rose) Fruit Oil, Elettaria Cardamomum (cardamom), Lavandula Angustifolia (lavender), Jasminum Officinale (jasmine), Tocopheryl Acetate, Cholesterol, Linoleic Acid, Trehalose, Glycerin, Caffeine, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Myristyl Laurate, Phytantriol, Acrylates Copolymer, Lecithin, Sodium Acrylates/acrylonitrogens Copolymer, Phytosphingosine, Propylene Glycol Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polysorbate 20, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbitan Laurate, Myristyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol Laurate, Tocopherol, Glycine, Sodium Hydroxide, Carbomer, Hydroxyproline, Proline, Citric Acid, Hexylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Massage onto clean skin morning and night.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I use this AM/PM and my skin absolutley loves the moisture. I have dry skin/prone to sensitivity and this has the perfect balance of being hydratjng but not greasy.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I use this AM/PM and my skin absolutley loves the moisture. I have dry skin/prone to sensitivity and this has the perfect balance of being hydratjng but not greasy.

reviews.headline: Love love love this !!!
reviews.comments: Makes my face feel silky and love how it feels on my face !

reviews.headline: Absolutely love it!!
reviews.comments: I love everything about it! Cant belive I didnt find it sooner as I was looking for foundation and decided to smell it and OMG hooked! Tried it on a couple times to make sure its didnt irritate my skink and just had to get it after it left me feeling amazing everytime. Cheyenne,Wy is very dry state so this is a holy grail!

reviews.headline: Holy grail product
reviews.comments: I have sensitive and dry skin and need to be careful with products especially moisturizers because my pores can clof easily. This is so lighr and airy yet sooo moisturizing it doesnt clog mg pores! Expensive but worth it. Hard to buy anything else now

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Love the way the moisturizer feels gliding on.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I love this product. I get milia so I meed something that doesnt clog my pores but is still very hydrating. This product is amazing and I refuse to switch to anything else. Its light on the skin but very hydrating. The only negative is the price!

reviews.headline: Buy it
reviews.comments: Hey combination oily skinned chocolate girls! If you are looking for something that will make your skin feel so soft and glow - stop here and just get it!

reviews.headline: The BEST EVER ! LITERALLY RUN
reviews.comments: Makeup applications is phenomenal.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive/dry skin
reviews.comments: This product stung when I would apply to face and was not moisturizing at all.

reviews.headline: Great Primer & More
reviews.comments: Really love this but took off one star because of price.

reviews.headline: Irritated my skin
reviews.comments: It's okay. It felt a little greasy and every time I use it I notice a slight burning in certain areas and red blotches. None of my other moisturizers have this effect on me. I bought two jars during a promotion so I'll be returning the 2nd.

reviews.headline: My go to every day moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is my everyday moisturizer. Works perfect before apply my daily sunscreen and makeup.

reviews.headline: she's that girl
reviews.comments: it's literally everything you want luxury and fine ingredients i definitely use it most under my gooood foundations it makes them last longer and gives a nice glass skin effect

reviews.headline: Perfect primer!
reviews.comments: Yes this is an excellent moisturizer. If you want compliments on how dewy your skin looks, how nice your make up is, use this underneath foundation! A very little is all you need. This jar lasts forever!  I have used for years. It blurs and gives a glow. Many makeup artists use this as a primer as well as getting benefits of a moisturizer. It's seriously great.

reviews.headline: Bobbi Brown knows skincare
reviews.comments: I love Bobbi Brown makeup and skincare. It is not cheap but worth the money.

reviews.headline: Yes I love it!
reviews.comments: Finally, I have found the moisturizer that I love!  I have tried so many brands but this one has a marvelous light texture, smells wonderful, and soaks into the skin easily without leaving a sticky residue.  Seriously, I truly love it!  My skin already appears moisturized and smoother.  It feels insanely soft to the touch.  All without harsh ingredients.  I am so glad that I finally bought it.

reviews.headline: Plumper Skin
reviews.comments: I love the way this moisturizer makes my skin feel!  Takes about 15 minutes to absorb, but after it does my skin feels so smooth & fuller looking.  My previous moisturizer did not provide enough hydration for my over 60 skin & it felt dry by morning.  The Bobbi Brown Hydrating Face Cream makes my skin still feel hydrated in the morning & it blurs my pores!!!  Works well under foundation also... give it about 10 minutes before I apply my foundation & I'm good to go.  Does not take a lot of product either.  I've been using for about a week to make sure I didn't have any reactions & I didn't.  Will definitely repurchase!!

reviews.headline: Best cream
reviews.comments: Hands down best facial cream I've used.  My skin is delivering serious results.

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: This product makes my face feel so good and makes my makeup last all day! Will definitely buy again.

media.headline: Is this supposed to be this heavy on my face?
media.caption: I had no acne before this crème at all!

faceoff_positive.comments: I turn 39 this month and have acne prone combination skin. This past winter, I developed contact dermatitis on my face. It was horrible...red, scaly, dry, itchy. My dermatologist gave me several samples of products to try over the course of several months, but all of them kept my face very dry. After tons of research and hundreds of dollars wasted, I found this (and many other Bobbi Brown make-up products). I went to my local dealer and a consultant gave me a makeover and recommended $500 worth of products. As she applied the moisturizer, I knew by the way it felt on my skin that I was buying it. I ended up buying everything she recommended that day. Within a week, my skin was entirely clear and looked even better than it did before I developed the condition. And my makeup looked amazing! She taught me a few tricks that I was unaware of ( mainly because I've never really learned much about makeup.) I've received multiple comments on my skin and makeup since I started using Bobbi Brown cosmetics and skin care. I'm a true believer!
faceoff_positive.headline: CLEARED my contact dermatitis!

faceoff_negative.comments: Considering that Bobbi Brown is on the more expensive side for skin care products I really wanted this to work for my skin. Sadly enough it has done nothing for me, still super dry. I'm surprised since this product was well reviewed for people. Maybe it's just my skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Really wanted to like this!
